description.brazilian: Obtenha todas as conquistas
description.french: Obtenez tous les succès.
description.italian: Ottieni tutti i gli obiettivi
description.japanese: 全ての実績を取得した
description.spanish: Consigue todos los logros.

description.brazilian: Execute uma Obliteração
description.french: Exécutez un anéantissement.
description.italian: Esegui un annientamento
description.japanese: 滅却を使用した
description.spanish: Completa una obliteración.

displayName.schinese: 血楔忍术 奴延鸟之型
displayName.tchinese: 血楔忍術　夜鳥之型

description.brazilian: Assuma a Forma do Corvo Sanguíneo
description.french: Activez la forme de Corbeau sanglant.
description.italian: Attiva la forma Corvo di sangue
description.japanese: 鵺の型を使用した
description.spanish: Adopta la forma cuervo de sangre.

displayName.english: The Art of the Bloodbath Kill
displayName.spanish: El arte del baño de sangre

description.brazilian: Execute um Abate Sanguinário
description.french: Exécutez un bain de sang.
description.italian: Esegui un'Uccisione sanguinaria
description.japanese: 血殺を使用した
description.spanish: Completa un baño de sangre.

displayName.english: The Art of the Bloodbath Slaughter
displayName.spanish: El arte de la masacre sangrienta

description.brazilian: Realize um Massacre Sanguinário
description.french: Exécutez un massacre général.
description.italian: Esegui un Tripudio di sangue
description.japanese: 乱血殺を使用した
description.spanish: Completa una masacre sangrienta.

description.brazilian: Use o Arpéu Frigânio
description.french: Utilisez le Câble trichoptère.
description.italian: Usa il Rampino Tricottero
description.japanese: 飛螻蛄を使用した
description.spanish: Usa el cable tricóptero.

description.brazilian: Use o Planador Odonato
description.french: Utilisez le Planeur libellule.
description.italian: Usa l'Aliante Libellula
description.japanese: 揺蚊を使用した
description.spanish: Usa la capa libélula.

description.brazilian: Use a Prancha Gerrídea
description.french: Utilisez l'Araignée d'eau.
description.italian: Usa il Gerride
description.japanese: 水馬を使用した
description.spanish: Usa el zapatero de agua.

description.english: Defeat the Kitsune Courtesan and break the first seal
description.brazilian: Derrote a Cortesã Kitsune e quebre o primeiro selo
description.french: Éliminez la Courtisane kitsune et brisez le premier sceau.
description.german: Besiege die Kitsune-Kurtisane und brich das erste Siegel.
description.italian: Sconfiggi la Cortigiana kitsune e rompi il primo sigillo
description.japanese: 妖魔 月虹の女狐を討ち、最初の封印を解除した
description.koreana: 요마 월홍의 여우를 물리치고 첫 봉인을 해제했다
description.russian: Победить куртизанку-кицунэ и сломать первую печать
description.schinese: 讨伐妖魔月虹女狐，解除了最初的封印。
description.spanish: Vence a la cortesana Kitsune y rompe el primer sello.
description.tchinese: 打倒妖魔「月虹之女狐」，解開第一個封印。
description.turkish: Kitsune Cariye'yi alt et ve ilk mührü kır

displayName.english: It's a Dog! It's a Plane! It's...
displayName.brazilian: É um Cachorro! É um Avião! É...
displayName.french: C'est un chien ! C'est un avion ! C'est...
displayName.german: Ist es ein Hund? Ein Flugzeug? Es ist ...
displayName.italian: È un cane! No, un aeroplano! È...
displayName.turkish: O bir köpek! Hayır, o bir uçak! O bir...

description.english: Defeat Kurobo and break the second seal
description.brazilian: Derrote Kurobo e quebre o segundo selo
description.french: Éliminez Kurobo et brisez le deuxième sceau.
description.german: Besiege Kurobo und brich das zweite Siegel.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Kurobo e rompi il secondo sigillo
description.japanese: 妖魔 風伯天外狗郎坊を討ち、2つ目の封印を解除した
description.koreana: 요마 풍백천외구랑방을 물리치고 두 번째 봉인을 해제했다
description.russian: Победить Куробо и сломать вторую печать
description.schinese: 讨伐妖魔风伯天外狗郎坊，解除了第2个封印。
description.spanish: Vence a Kurobo y rompe el segundo sello.
description.tchinese: 打倒妖魔「風伯天外狗郎坊」，解開第二個封印。
description.turkish: Kurobo'yu alt et ve ikinci mührü kır

description.english: Defeat Cetus and break the third seal
description.brazilian: Derrote Cetus e quebre o terceiro selo
description.french: Éliminez Cetus et brisez le troisième sceau.
description.german: Besiege Cetus und brich das dritte Siegel.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Cetus e rompi il terzo sigillo
description.japanese: 魔神 ケイトゥスを討ち、3つ目の封印を解除した
description.koreana: 마신 케투스를 물리치고 세 번째 봉인을 해제했다
description.russian: Победить Кета и сломать третью печать
description.schinese: 讨伐魔神塞特斯，解除了第3个封印。
description.spanish: Vence a Cetus y rompe el tercer sello.
description.tchinese: 打倒魔神「凱圖斯」，解開第三個封印。
description.turkish: Cetus'u alt et ve ilk mührü kır

description.english: Revive the Dark Dragon in exchange for Seori's life
description.brazilian: Ressuscite o Dragão das Trevas em troca da vida de Seori
description.french: Ressuscitez le Dragon noir en échange de la vie de Seori.
description.german: Erwecke den Dunklen Drachen wieder, im Tausch gegen Seoris Leben.
description.italian: Fai risorgere il Drago Nero in cambio della vita di Seori
description.japanese: セオリの死と引き換えに、真なる黒龍が復活した
description.koreana: 세오리의 죽음과 맞바꾸어 진정한 흑룡이 부활했다
description.russian: Воскресить Тёмного дракона, пожертвовав жизнью Сэори
description.schinese: 以濑织之死为代价，复活了真正的黑龙。
description.spanish: Revive al Dragón Oscuro a cambio de la vida de Seori.
description.tchinese: 以瀨織的死作為代價，使真正的黑龍復活。
description.turkish: Seori'nin hayatı karşılığında Karanlık Ejder'i canlandır

displayName.tchinese: 最強之忍　再次出擊

description.brazilian: Comece a história de Ryu Hayabusa
description.french: Commencez l'histoire de Ryu Hayabusa.
description.italian: Inizia la storia di Ryu Hayabusa
description.japanese: リュウ・ハヤブサの新たな物語を始める
description.spanish: Empieza la historia de Ryu Hayabusa.
description.tchinese: 開啟龍隼故事的新篇章。

description.english: Head to the final battle carrying the wishes of Seori (and Kureha)
description.brazilian: Vá para a batalha final com os desejos de Seori (e Kureha)
description.french: Rendez-vous à l'affrontement final pour accomplir le souhait de Seori (et Kureha).
description.german: Begib dich in den letzten Kampf, begleitet von Seoris (und Kurehas) Wünschen.
description.italian: Affronta la battaglia finale per realizzare la volontà di Seori (e di Kureha)
description.japanese: セオリ、そして幼馴染 呉葉の願いを背負い、最後の闘いへ向かう
description.koreana: 세오리, 그리고 소꿉친구 쿠레하의 소망을 짊어지고 마지막 전투에 나선다
description.russian: Вступить в финальный бой, чтобы исполнить волю Сэори (и Курэхи)
description.schinese: 背负濑织和自幼相识的吴叶的愿望，挑战最后的战斗。
description.spanish: Dirígete a la batalla final para cumplir los deseos de Seori (y de Kureha).
description.tchinese: 背負著瀨織與兒時玩伴──吳葉的心願，前往最後的戰役。
description.turkish: Seori'nin (ve Kureha'nın) dileklerini taşıyarak son savaşa gir

description.english: Hold your own against Ryu Hayabusa
description.brazilian: Mantenha-se firme contra Ryu Hayabusa
description.french: Défendez-vous contre Ryu Hayabusa.
description.italian: Tieni testa a Ryu Hayabusa
description.japanese: 超忍 リュウ・ハヤブサを超える
description.russian: Продержаться в схватке с Рю Хаябусой
description.spanish: Planta cara a Ryu Hayabusa.

description.english: Purify the Dark Dragon and save the world
description.brazilian: Purifique o Dragão das Trevas e salve o mundo
description.french: Purifiez le Dragon noir et sauvez le monde.
description.german: Läutere den Dunklen Drachen und rette die Welt.
description.italian: Purifica il Drago Nero e salva il mondo
description.japanese: 黒龍を浄化し、世界を晴らす
description.russian: Изгнать Тёмного дракона и спасти мир
description.schinese: 净化黑龙，还世界一片净土。
description.spanish: Purifica al Dragón Oscuro y salva el mundo.
description.tchinese: 淨化黑龍，讓世界回歸光明。
description.turkish: Karanlık Ejder'i arındır ve dünyayı kurtar

description.english: Complete the game on MASTER NINJA difficulty
description.german: Schließe das Spiel auf der Schwierigkeitsstufe NINJA-MEISTER ab.
description.french: Terminez le jeu en mode MAÎTRE NINJA.
description.italian: Completa il gioco alla difficoltà MAESTRO NINJA
description.spanish: Completa el juego en dificultad MAESTRO NINJA.
description.russian: Пройти игру на уровне сложности МАСТЕР-НИНДЗЯ
description.japanese: 難易度「MASTER NINJA」でクリアした
description.turkish: Oyunu USTA NİNJA zorluk derecesinde tamamla
description.brazilian: Termine o jogo na dificuldade MESTRE NINJA

description.english: Reach maximum health with Yakumo and Ryu
description.brazilian: Atinja a Saúde Máxima com Yakumo e Ryu
description.french: Atteignez le maximum de santé avec Yakumo et Ryu.
description.german: Erreiche die maximale Gesundheit mit Yakumo und Ryu.
description.italian: Raggiungi la salute massima con Yakumo e Ryu
description.japanese: ヤクモとリュウの体力が最大値になった
description.russian: Получить максимум ОЗ, играя за Якумо и Рю
description.schinese: 八云和隼龙的体力已为最大值。
description.spanish: Aumenta la salud de Yakumo y Ryu al máximo.
description.tchinese: 八雲與龍隼的體力達到最大值。
description.turkish: Yakumo ve Ryu ile maksimum can seviyesine ulaş

description.english: Use Takeminakata to attack 5 or more enemies at once
description.brazilian: Use Takeminakata para atacar 5 ou mais inimigos de uma vez
description.french: Utilisez Takeminakata pour attaquer 5 ennemis ou plus à la fois.
description.german: Benutze das Takeminakata, um mindestens fünf Gegner auf einmal anzugreifen.
description.italian: Usa Takeminakata per attaccare 5 o più nemici contemporaneamente
description.japanese: 鬼刃建御名方を使い、同時に5体以上の敵へ攻撃を当てた
description.koreana: 귀도 타케미나카타로 동시에 5개체 이상 적에게 공격을 가했다
description.russian: Атаковать 5 или более врагов одновременно, используя Такэминаката
description.schinese: 使用鬼刃建御名方，同时击中5个以上敌人。
description.spanish: Usa Takeminakata para atacar a 5 enemigos o más a la vez.
description.tchinese: 使用鬼刃建御名方，同時擊中5名以上敵人。
description.turkish: Takeminakata ile tek seferde 5 veya daha fazla düşmana saldır

description.english: Use Yatousen to inflict massive damage in a short time
description.brazilian: Use Yatousen para causar muitos danos em pouco tempo
description.french: Utilisez Yatousen pour infliger d'immenses dégâts en peu de temps.
description.german: Verwende das Yatousen, um in kurzer Zeit massiven Schaden anzurichten.
description.italian: Usa Yatousen per infliggere ingenti danni in breve tempo
description.japanese: 降魔夜刀穿を使い、短時間で大ダメージを与えた
description.koreana: 항마 야도천으로 단시간에 큰 대미지를 주었다
description.russian: Нанести колоссальный урон за короткое время, используя Ятоусэн
description.schinese: 使用降魔夜刀穿，短时间内造成了大量伤害。
description.spanish: Usa Yatousen para infligir mucho daño en poco tiempo.
description.tchinese: 使用降魔夜刀穿，在短時間內對敵人造成巨大傷害。
description.turkish: Yatousen ile kısa sürede büyük hasar ver

description.english: Use Magatsuhi to Bloodbath Kill 5 or more enemies in a short time
description.brazilian: Use Magatsuhi para realizar um Abate Sanguinário em 5 ou mais inimigos em pouco tempo
description.french: Utilisez Magatsuhi pour exécuter un bain de sang sur 5 ennemis ou plus en peu de temps.
description.german: Verwende das Magatsuhi, um mindestens fünf Gegner in kurzer Zeit mit Blutbad-Kill zu töten.
description.italian: Usa Magatsuhi per eseguire l'Uccisione sanguinaria su 5 o più nemici in breve tempo
description.japanese: 崩震槌マガツヒを使い、短時間で5体以上血殺した
description.koreana: 붕진추 마가츠히로 단시간에 5개체 이상 적을 혈살했다
description.russian: Убить «Кровавым дождём» 5 или более врагов за короткое время, используя Магацухи
description.schinese: 使用崩震槌祸津日，短时间内用血杀之术杀了5名以上敌人。
description.spanish: Usa Magatsuhi para matar con baño de sangre a 5 enemigos o más en poco tiempo.
description.tchinese: 使用崩震槌禍津日，在短時間內以血殺之術擊敗5名以上敵人。
description.turkish: Magatsuhi ile kısa sürede 5 veya daha fazla düşmanı Kanlı İnfaz ile öldür

displayName.french: Maître de la boîte à outils

description.english: Use Kage-Hiruko to defeat an enemy launched in the air
description.brazilian: Use Kage-Hiruko para derrotar um inimigo lançado no ar
description.french: Utilisez Kage-Hiruko pour éliminer un ennemi en vol.
description.german: Verwende das Kage-Hiruko, um einen Gegner zu besiegen, der in die Luft geschleudert wurde.
description.italian: Usa Kage-Hiruko per sconfiggere un nemico che sia stato lanciato in aria
description.japanese: 秘器・影蛭子を使い、空中の敵を浮かせたまま倒した
description.koreana: 비기 카게히루코로 공중의 적을 떠 있는 상태에서 물리쳤다
description.russian: Победить подброшенного в воздух врага с помощью «Гнева Хируко»
description.schinese: 使用暗器影蛭子，在浮空状态下直接击倒空中的敌人。
description.spanish: Usa Kage-Hiruko para vencer a un enemigo al que hayas lanzado por los aires.
description.tchinese: 使用秘器．影蛭子，不讓空中的敵人落地便將其擊敗。
description.turkish: Havaya fırlatılan bir düşmanı Kage-Hiruko ile öldür

description.english: Recover the lost Dark Dragon Blade
description.brazilian: Recupere a Lâmina do Dragão das Trevas perdida
description.french: Récupérez l'épée du Dragon noir égarée.
description.german: Beschaffe die Klinge des Dunklen Drachen wieder.
description.italian: Recupera la Lama del Drago Nero perduta
description.japanese: 失われた黒龍丸・血光を再び入手した
description.schinese: 再次获得了失去的黑龙丸血光。
description.spanish: Recupera la Espada del Dragón Oscuro perdida.
description.turkish: Kayıp Karanlık Ejder Kılıcı'nı geri al

description.english: Defeat Oniwaka in his final encounter--he wouldn't have lasted long in this world anyway
description.brazilian: Derrote Oniwaka em seu confronto final. Não é como se ele fosse durar nesse mundo mesmo
description.french: Éliminez Oniwaka lors de votre dernière rencontre (de toute façon, il n'aurait pas fait long feu).
description.german: Besiege Oniwaka in seiner letzten Begegnung – seine Zeit in dieser Welt war eh fast abgelaufen.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Oniwaka nell'incontro finale (non avrebbe retto a lungo in questo mondo in ogni caso)
description.japanese: 幾度の闘いの末、オニワカを始末した。いずれにせよ、この世界で長生きするタマではない
description.koreana: 몇 번의 싸움 끝에 오니와카를 해치웠다. 어차피 이 세계에서 오래 살 그릇은 아니었다.
description.russian: Победить Ониваку в последней схватке — его дни в нашем мире всё равно сочтены
description.schinese: 多番战斗后，最终把鬼若解决了。反正他在这个世界就不是长寿之相。
description.spanish: Vence a Oniwaka en el encuentro final. De todos modos, no habría durado mucho en este mundo.
description.tchinese: 與鬼若多次交手後，在最後一場對決中殺了他。反正他也活不了多久了。
description.turkish: Son karşılaşmasında Oniwaka'yı öldür. Zaten bu dünyada fazla kalamazdı

description.brazilian: Conclua 20 missões
description.french: Accomplissez 20 missions.
description.italian: Completa 20 missioni
description.japanese: 忍務を累計20種類達成した
description.spanish: Completa 20 misiones.

description.brazilian: Obtenha 100.000 NinjaCoins
description.french: Obtenez 100 000 NinjaCoin.
description.italian: Guadagna 100.000 NinjaCoin
description.japanese: 忍貨を累計100,000以上入手した
description.schinese: 累计获得了100,000以上的忍币。
description.spanish: Consigue 100 000 créditos ninja.

displayName.russian: Я не жадный, мне для дела

description.brazilian: Obtenha 30 itens
description.french: Obtenez 30 objets.
description.italian: Ottieni 30 oggetti
description.japanese: アイテムを累計30回入手した
description.spanish: Consigue 30 objetos.

description.english: Defeat 3 enemies in a row with an Ultimate Technique
description.brazilian: Derrote 3 inimigos seguidos com uma Técnica Suprema
description.french: Éliminez 3 ennemis d'affilée avec une Technique ultime.
description.german: Besiege drei Gegner hintereinander mit einer Ultimativen Technik.
description.italian: Sconfiggi 3 nemici di seguito con una Tecnica Finale
description.japanese: 絶技で敵を3体連続で倒した
description.schinese: 使用绝技之术连续击倒3个敌人。
description.spanish: Vence a 3 enemigos seguidos con una técnica definitiva.
description.tchinese: 以絕技之術連續擊敗3名敵人。
description.turkish: Bir Üstün Teknik ile art arda 3 düşmanı öldür

description.brazilian: Realize um combo de 2.000 pontos
description.french: Exécutez un combo à 2000 points de karma.
description.italian: Esegui una combo da 2.000 punti
description.japanese: 連撃スコア2000を達成した
description.spanish: Consigue un combo de 2000 puntos.

description.english: Clear Chapter 02 without falling once (Auto Movement must be turned OFF)
description.brazilian: Termine o Capítulo 02 sem cair nenhuma vez (o movimento automático deve estar desligado)
description.french: Terminez le chapitre 2 sans tomber une seule fois (le déplacement auto doit être désactivé)
description.german: Schließe Kapitel 02 ab, ohne einmal zu fallen. (Automatische Bewegung muss AUS sein.)
description.italian: Completa il capitolo 02 senza cadere nemmeno una volta (il movimento auto. dev'essere disattivato)
description.japanese: CHAPTER02で一度も落下せずにクリアした　※オート移動時は除く
description.koreana: CHAPTER 02에서 한 번도 낙하하지 않고 클리어했다 ※자동 이동 제외
description.russian: Пройти главу 2 с отключённым автоматическим бегом, ни разу не упав
description.schinese: CHAPTER02中在一次都没有坠落的状态下通关。※自动移动时除外。
description.spanish: Completa el capítulo 02 sin caer una sola vez (con el movimiento automático desactivado).
description.tchinese: 在CHAPTER02中一次也不墜落便通關。　※自動移動除外
description.turkish: Bölüm 2'yi düşmeden tamamla (Otomatik Hareket KAPALI olmalı)

description.english: Clear Chapter 06 without hitting any obstacles (Auto Movement must be turned OFF)
description.brazilian: Termine o Capítulo 06 sem bater em nenhum obstáculo (o movimento automático deve estar desligado)
description.french: Terminez le chapitre 6 sans toucher un seul obstacle (le déplacement auto doit être désactivé)
description.german: Schließe Kapitel 06 ab, ohne ein Hindernis zu berühren. (Automatische Bewegung muss AUS sein.)
description.italian: Completa il capitolo 06 senza colpire alcun ostacolo (il movimento auto. dev'essere disattivato)
description.japanese: CHAPTER06で一度も障害物に当たらずにクリアした　※オート移動時は除く
description.koreana: CHAPTER 06에서 한 번도 장애물에 부딪히지 않고 클리어했다 ※자동 이동 제외
description.russian: Пройти главу 6 с отключённым автоматическим бегом, не врезаясь в препятствия
description.schinese: CHAPTER06中在一次都没有碰到障碍物的状态下通关。※自动移动时除外。
description.spanish: Completa el capítulo 06 sin chocar contra obstáculos (con el movimiento automático desactivado).
description.tchinese: 在CHAPTER06中一次也不碰到障礙物便通關。　※自動移動除外
description.turkish: Bölüm 6'yı engellere çarpmadan tamamla (Otomatik Hareket KAPALI olmalı)

description.english: Clear Chapter 10 without hitting any obstacles (Auto Movement must be turned OFF)
description.brazilian: Termine o Capítulo 10 sem bater em nenhum obstáculo (o movimento automático deve estar desligado)
description.french: Terminez le chapitre 10 sans toucher un seul obstacle (le déplacement auto doit être désactivé)
description.german: Schließe Kapitel 10 ab, ohne ein Hindernis zu berühren. (Automatische Bewegung muss AUS sein.)
description.italian: Completa il capitolo 10 senza colpire alcun ostacolo (il movimento auto. dev'essere disattivato)
description.japanese: CHAPTER10で一度も障害物に当たらずにクリアした　※オート移動時は除く
description.koreana: CHAPTER 10에서 한 번도 장애물에 부딪히지 않고 클리어했다 ※자동 이동 제외
description.russian: Пройти главу 10 с отключённым автоматическим бегом, не врезаясь в препятствия
description.schinese: CHAPTER10中在一次都没有碰到障碍物的状态下通关。※自动移动时除外。
description.spanish: Completa el capítulo 10 sin chocar contra obstáculos (con el movimiento automático desactivado).
description.tchinese: 在CHAPTER10中一次也不碰到障礙物便通關。　※自動移動除外
description.turkish: Bölüm 10'u engellere çarpmadan tamamla (Otomatik Hareket KAPALI olmalı)

description.english: Clear Chapter 12 without being hit by a laser (Auto Movement must be turned OFF)
description.brazilian: Termine o Capítulo 12 sem ser atingido por um laser (o movimento automático deve estar desligado)
description.french: Terminez le chapitre 12 sans vous faire toucher par un laser (déplacement auto doit être désactivé)
description.german: Schließe Kapitel 12 ab, ohne von einem Laser getroffen zu werden. (Autom. Bewegung muss AUS sein.)
description.italian: Completa il capitolo 12 senza farti colpire dai laser (il movimento auto. dev'essere disattivato)
description.japanese: CHAPTER12でレーザーに一度も当たらずにクリアした　※オート移動時は除く
description.koreana: CHAPTER 12에서 한 번도 레이저에 맞지 않고 클리어했다 ※자동 이동 제외
description.russian: Пройти главу 12 с отключённым автоматическим бегом, не попав под луч лазера
description.schinese: CHAPTER12中在一次都没有被激光击中的状态下通关。※自动移动时除外。
description.spanish: Completa el capítulo 12 sin que te dé ningún láser (con el movimiento automático desactivado).
description.tchinese: 在CHAPTER12中一次也不碰到雷射光束便通關。　※自動移動除外
description.turkish: Bölüm 12'yi lazerle vurulmadan tamamla (Otomatik Hareket KAPALI olmalı)

description.brazilian: Aprenda todas as Habilidades de Arma da Lâmina do Dragão das Trevas
description.french: Apprenez toutes les compétences d'arme de l'épée du Dragon noir.

description.japanese: 黒龍丸・血光の全ての技を会得した
description.russian: Освоить все навыки оружия: клинок Тёмного дракона

description.brazilian: Aprenda todas as Habilidades de Combate
description.french: Apprenez toutes les compétences de combat.
description.italian: Apprendi tutte le abilità di combattimento
description.japanese: 体術を全て会得した
description.spanish: Aprende todas las habilidades de combate.

description.brazilian: Oblitere todos os inimigos
description.french: Anéantissez tous les ennemis.
description.italian: Annienta tutti i nemici
description.japanese: すべての敵を滅却した
description.spanish: Oblitera a todos los enemigos.

description.brazilian: Colete todos os Porongos
description.french: Récupérez toutes les calebêtes.
description.italian: Raccogli tutte le fiasche animate
description.japanese: 瓜瓢箪を全て入手した
description.spanish: Consigue todos los calabazos.

description.brazilian: Conclua todas as missões
description.french: Accomplissez toutes les missions.
description.italian: Completa tutte le missioni
description.japanese: 忍務を全てクリアした
description.spanish: Completa todas las misiones.

description.brazilian: Conclua todas as provações do Purgatório
description.french: Terminez toutes les épreuves du purgatoire.
description.italian: Completa tutti i cimenti del Purgatorio
description.japanese: 煉獄を全てクリアした
description.spanish: Completa todas las pruebas de purgatorio.

description.english: Complete any chapter without dying (excluding Chapters 00 and 14)
description.brazilian: Termine qualquer capítulo sem morrer (exceto os capítulos 00 e 14)
description.french: Terminez un chapitre sans mourir (hors chapitres 00 et 14).
description.german: Schließe ein beliebiges Kapitel ab, ohne zu sterben (mit Ausnahme von Kapiteln 00 und 14).
description.italian: Completa un capitolo qualsiasi senza morire (esclusi i capitoli 00 e 14)
description.japanese: いずれかのCHAPTERで、一度もGAME OVERにならずにクリアした　※CHAPTER00と14は除く
description.koreana: 한 번도 GAME OVER 되지 않고 CHAPTER 하나를 클리어했다 ※CHAPTER 00과 14 제외
description.russian: Пройти все главы, не погибнув (главы 00 и 14 не учитываются)
description.schinese: 在任意一个CHAPTER中，以从未GAME OVER的状态通关。※CHAPTER00和14除外。
description.spanish: Completa cualquier capítulo sin morir (excepto el 00 y el 14).
description.tchinese: 在任一CHAPTER中一次也沒有GAME OVER便通關。　※CHAPTER00和CHAPTER14除外
description.turkish: Herhangi bir bölümü ölmeden tamamla (Bölüm 0 ve 14 hariç)

description.brazilian: Conclua todos os desafios
description.french: Terminez tous les défis.
description.italian: Completa tutte le sfide
description.japanese: チャレンジミッションを全てクリアした
description.spanish: Completa todos los desafíos.
